= chain2tsv =

== Format ==
cg chain2tsv chainfile outputfile

== Summary ==
Converts data in UCSC chain file format (for liftOver) to a tsv (tab separated) format to be used
in e.g. cg liftregion.

== Arguments ==
; **chainfile**: UCSC chain file as used in liftOver
; **outputfile**: name of tsv file to be created, will contain corresponding regions in the to reference genomes

== Category ==
Conversion
